name: Pinbullet
description:
DISCLAIMER

Leaderboard currently not available in the WebGL version. Works in Windows build.

Controls

R - Start Round

Mouse - Aim

Space - Shoot!

Description

Made for KluJam 2021 Summer Edition in 48 hours. Theme was 'Unusual Combination'. 

Gain as many points as you can in three rounds. If you manage to keep the bomb in the game for 60 seconds, you get extra points! Don't worry if the bomb get's stuck in a wall, you get one additional round ;)

Submit your highscore and battle your friends.

Credits

https://www.1001freefonts.com/arcade-future.font
